answers.answer: Could be preeclampsia. Not somthing to mess around with call ur dr. Or go into the er. Right away.
Labor and delivery would prob be better than the er.
Need to have blood pressure checked i have swelling too but normal bp its called oedema, just part of pregnancy. But if high bp be preeclampsia xxx

Rang the hospital they said it sounds like it's just the stage of pregnancy that I'm at and to call them back if i start to develop headaches or blurred vision, i woke up this morning looking like the Michelin man oh the joys of pregnancy, fingers crossed they give me a date when I'm up on Thurs

question: 2 days to go and i woke this morning with a giant coldsore and a really puffy face, my ankles and hands are swollen to, has anyone else had this? I'm so ready for this to be over now lol
title: swollen face! is this normal?
